snippet: At Dragonfly, opening on the Upper East Side, a chef’s sabbatical in Asia bears fruit; Momofuku Milk Bar opens in Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn.
abstract: Restaurants Dragonfly, Estia's American, Gastro Bar at 35th and Momofuku Milk Bar open in New York.
lead_paragraph: At Dragonfly, opening on the Upper East Side, a chef’s sabbatical in Asia bears fruit; Momofuku Milk Bar opens in Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Dragonfly and Momofuku Milk Bar Open
